name: JT Marketing Agency
description:
JT Marketing is Iraq’s first Meta-verified digital solutions provider, empowering businesses across the MENA region to build trust, automate communication, and achieve measurable growth.

We specialize in delivering AI-powered and automation-based tools that help brands connect with customers at scale and drive long-term success:

• Meta & WhatsApp Business Verification
• WhatsApp API & Cloud Messaging
• Bulk WhatsApp Sender Portal
• Custom Chatbots (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Telegram, Web)
• Data Collection & Analytics from Social Media & Websites
• Website Design & Development

With a proven track record, JT Marketing helps organizations boost visibility, automate processes, and achieve sustainable growth — powered by verified tools, local expertise, and innovative technology.
